Summary Managing Director and Founder of music distribution and label services company Zincbeats LLC. Co-founder of music publishing and administration company Kgn Six LLC. 
 
Music and media business professional with extensive experience in music distribution, licensing, publishing, royalties, copyright, technology and marketing. Thorough understanding of the contemporary landscapes of the music and media businesses. In-depth knowledge of digital media technologies and skilled in audio/video production techniques. 
 
Frequent public speaker on music and media topics. 
 
Former software developer focused on statistics, data analysis, large-scale databases and bioinformatics systems. 
 
Electrical engineer with strong background in signal processing. 
 
Deep house and techno producer, writer and DJ/performing artist. 
 
Specialties & Experience: 
• music / media licensing & distribution 
• music publishing & administration 
• royalty accounting 
• copyright & intellectual property law 
• extensive experience with the following CMS & backend systems: YouTube / SoundCloud / Harry Fox Agency eMechanical / PRS For Music / SoundExchange / PPL / ASCAP / BMI / Music Reports / iTunes Connect / FUGA / The Orchard 
• contract negotiation 
• online marketing & promotion 
• event production
